ProductInfo.Features:
Use an Unshielded Twisted Pair cable (UTP), like CAT5, to transmit full motion camera video signal in B&W; up to 2000ft / 600m and in color up to 1200ft / 400m.
Surge / Lightning Protection / 10/700 μs Pulses: 2KV / Standard: IEC61000-4-5 / ESD : Electrostatic Discharge Protection
Contact Discharge: 6KV / Air Discharge: 8KV / Standard: IEC61000-4-2 / Wave & Interference Rejection & Noise Filter
Built-in Filter: 0~6HMz with Extra Interference Rejection <60db / Passive, no power required
Fast, easy installation, saving time and money / Substantial savings on the cost of the cable itself
ProductInfo.Name: Passive Video Filter Balun, Push-in Terminal Type
